snippet: The railroad said it had upgraded its cellular-based Wi-Fi offering using broadband technologies that will improve speed and reliability.
abstract: Amtrak says it has upgraded its cellular-based Wi-Fi using broadband technologies that will improve speed and reliability of the Internet in its passenger cars; has endured years of criticism of wireless service on its trains.
lead_paragraph: The railroad said it had upgraded its cellular-based Wi-Fi offering using broadband technologies that will improve speed and reliability.

headline.seo: Amtrak Upgrades Wi-Fi Service on Trains
headline.main: Amtrak Upgrades Wi-Fi Service on Trains
headline.print_headline: Amtrak Upgrades Wi-Fi Service on Trains
